title: Premier League Names David Pemsel as Its New CEO
text:
After a nine-month search and at least two false starts, the most popular sports league on the planet finally found someone to lead it. The Premier League on Wednesday appointed David Pemsel of the London-based Guardian Media Group as its new CEO, immediately making him one of the most influential executives in sports.

The process dragged on far longer than the league had ever expected after its first choice—Susanna Dinnage, the global president of Discovery Inc.’s Animal Planet—changed her mind about accepting the role last...
description: The Premier League on Wednesday appointed David Pemsel of the London-based Guardian Media Group as its new CEO, immediately making him one of the most influential executives in sports.
